name: Taken (itch) (BeenZone)
description:
Taken is first person horror game, about someone who finds himself in somebody else's house, and whilst escaping, uncovers the truth to how he got there in the first place, and what happened to those before him. 

This game contains jump scares, with occasional flashing lights, and loud noises.
